LanguageData.ButcherAnimalFlesh.label: butcher animal
LanguageData.ButcherAnimalFlesh.description: Butchers an animal to obtain its meat in usable form.\n\nSelecting Do Until will only count animal meat.
LanguageData.ButcherHumanFlesh.label: butcher human
LanguageData.ButcherHumanFlesh.description: Butchers a human to obtain its meat in usable form.\n\nSelecting Do Until will only count human meat.
LanguageData.ButcherInsectFlesh.label: butcher insect
LanguageData.ButcherInsectFlesh.description: Butchers an insect to obtain its meat in usable form.\n\nSelecting Do Until will only count insect meat.
LanguageData.ButcherAnimalHumanFlesh.label: butcher animal or human
LanguageData.ButcherAnimalHumanFlesh.description: Butchers an animal or human to obtain its meat in usable form.\n\nSelecting Do Until will only count animal and human meat.
LanguageData.ButcherHumanInsectFlesh.label: butcher human or insect
LanguageData.ButcherHumanInsectFlesh.description: Butchers a human or insect to obtain its meat in usable form.\n\nSelecting Do Until will only count human or insect meat.
